quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: It feels deliberate, like they’re trying to erase parts of my case.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I can’t say if it’s deliberate, but I understand why you’d feel that way.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: Because every time I look, something else is missing or not logged.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: Yes, and that’s why I’ve pushed for them to review their systems.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: But if they’ve already lost things, how do I know it won’t happen again?

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: That’s a fair concern. I’ll keep raising it until they give proper assurance.

contradictions.issue: Victim perceives deliberate erasure vs. advocate frames it as system issue

timeline_hooks.link: Advocate claims to push for systemic review
